name: DARKNESS (SPACEGAMESstudio)
description: You run around as a stick man and you have to try to complete the level as fast as possible. But when you die the game rewinds you back to the start and you have to start over. This is a submission for brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam and i had a lot of fun making this game in one week. I will have a video on my YouTube Channel about the development of this game and my expereance doing my first gamejam.  SPACEGAMESstudio
